```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
library(ggthemes)
library(lubridate)
```

# Load the data
```{r}

homicides <- read.csv("data/homicide-data.csv")

homicides <- homicides %>%
  unite("city_name", city:state, sep = ", ")
```


# Just show baltimore
```{r}
baltimore <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore, MD")


baltimore
```

# Group by month and year
```{r}
baltimore_summary <-baltimore %>%
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>%
  mutate(year = year(reported_date)) %>%
  mutate(month = month(reported_date)) %>%
  group_by(year, month) %>%
  count()
  


baltimore_summary <- baltimore_summary %>%
  mutate(date = paste(year, month, "15", sep = "-")) %>%
  mutate(date = ymd(date))


```
